p: Further constraints for operations at remote locations are e.g., set by rescue and evacuation systems and helicopter flights for personnel transfer. An installation is considered remote if it is located more than 40 nautical miles from the nearest manned installation or airport/heliport. Consequently, consideration should be given to provide Jet-A1 refueling facilities, where the distance from shore to an installation or vessel (with an operational helideck) exceeds 50Â nautical miles.
